name: Mini Jam 57: A girl stranded
description:
Our entry for the Mini Jam 57.

"A girl stranded" is a story about a girl, that got trapped in a cave.

It's up to you, to guide her towards crafting the necessary items, to save her from her fate full of rats and zombies.

Controls
W A S D: Movement
E: Eat/Drop
Left Mouse: Pick up / Drop / Use
Carry items on the mat in the top left, to craft them together.

Disclaimer: This title is safe for work in it's current state. We may release a version that better suits the direction of our studio afterwards.
Also it doesn't contain any sound as of right now.
